remarks: Hypothesis elimination lemma for complex inner product spaces to assist weak deduction theorem.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
elimph.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
elimph.5 $e |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) $.
elimph.6 $e |- U e. CPreHilOLD $.
elimph $p |- if ( A e. X , A , Z ) e. X $.
